title: Understanding Paired $$t-test$$
text: A paired $$t-test$$ is used when you have two sets of related data. Can you think of a scenario where this might be applicable?

title: Identifying the Groups
text: In a paired $$t-test$$, the two sets of data are often from the same group measured at two different times. What might these two times represent?

hintAnswer: To compare means from the same group at different times
title: Purpose of Paired $$t-test$$
text: What is the main purpose of a paired $$t-test$$?
choices: To compare means from two different groups
To compare means from the same group at different times
